title: Treacle Oat Bread
ingredients: ['75g (3 oz) porridge oats', '100g (4 oz) treacle', '5 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '350ml (12 fl oz) boiling water', '2 tablespoons dried active baking yeast', '100ml (4 fl oz) warm water', '100g (4 oz) wholemeal flour', '675g (1 1/2 lb) bread flour', '2 eggs']
